name: EVHUB.IN
tag_list: electric-hybrid-vehicles, news, media, partners, information, online, business-networking, opportunities, free, premium, paid, virtual-online-showrooms, electric-bikes, india, usa, china
overview:
Online B2B, E-Commerce, Advertising and Media portal including Technical consultancy services for developing Green Products and Technologies. Online services

  • Business to Business platform for EV related companies- Premium members, featured products.
  • Online Shopping for Environment friendly products
  • Online Advertising and Media Services: Banner Ads, Featured articles, Channel partnerships, lead generation partners for International events, Engineering products and services.

Offline Services:

  • Engineering and R&D Consultancy Services
  • Product development & Technical consultancy services related to electric vehicles, renewable energy, special machine design and development.
  • Project execution guidance and support for research oriented academic projects.

Contact us at info@evhub.in

Feb 1st 2011, M/S EVHUB.IN got registered as a partnership firm with “The Registrar of firms, Srikakulam” with registration number 17/2011 srikakulam dated 01.02.10. The registered office address is as follows

M/S EVHUB.IN D.no. 2-5-139 Illisipuram Srikakulam Andhrapradesh - 532001
